Embattled Medford housing chief Covelle resigning

Robert Covelle is leaving his post a year after officials began to investigate allegations of favoritism in hiring and contracting under his leadership. (Boston Globe)

Schilling asks R.I. for money for his firm

Former Red Sox pitcher Curt Schilling asked officials today for more money for his video game company after moving it to Providence last year in return for $75 million in state loan guarantees. (Boston Globe)

WFNX being sold, most staff let go

Boston radio station WFNX is starting the process of transferring to Clear Channel Communications. Most of its 21 staffers were laid off today. (Boston Globe)
